name: PREP
description:
PREP is a smart online learning & test preparation platform that helps learners of all ages reach their full potential. Founded in 2020 by Tu Pham, Prep's ultimate vision is to enable every learner to feel as if they have a dedicated personal teacher and mentor to help them achieve their learning targets.

PREP offerings include personalized study plans, interactive contents and AI-powered test rooms. By 2023, it has helped hundreds of thousands of users in their journey to get their desired test scores.

PREP's culture is based on three values: recognition, dedication and help.
